website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful cotton wall covering that's hard to beat for the price.
pros: Mandala print quickly makes over space with a universally appealing design
Lightweight and beautiful design covers a large wall space for a super low price
Decent fabric quality designed for wall use
cons: Color and sizing varies a bit

customer_reviews.title: the quality is great!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, for all of you guys complaining about the cheap fabric and print, what did you expect for $10? An authentic, handwoven Indian tapestry? For the price, the quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Janes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cotton fabric.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely product. I mounted mine onto a frame with batting behind it like a canvas. I hung it in our dining area of our kitchen to absorb sound, and to look decorative. It looks great! It is an average weight cotton fabric. It washed fine and faded a tiny bit... prior to my mounting project. There fabric is not very soft, if that matters to anyone. It doesn't matter for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wowwwwww
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful !!!!! For this price the fabric is great the colors are stunning !!! I absolutely love this Product and would buy again . Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R.

customer_reviews.title: I would not at all recommend buying this
customer_reviews.text: I would not at all recommend buying this. The colors on mine are dark and there is way more green and a dark blue than I had expected. There was zero turquoise which I was expecting and excited for. Plus, there are some spaces that are missing color or faded and I just opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely will order more of these! They are light weight, beautifully colored and this one works perfectly for a table cloth/table runner for my dinning table. Wasjed it in gentle cold cycle, even tho it says to hand wash, and dries it on air dry in the dyer. Very slight shrinkage , which is to be expected since I didn't follow Care directions. I really do recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great but loose on measurements
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 4 of these over the past couple months. You're not going to get exactly what's pictured nor the exact size, but close enough probably. If you need quality controlled products, this isn't for you, but if it can be "in the zone" you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dietcokeani

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful print, inconsistent colors
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are entirely cotton, however there is extreme color inconsistency. I had ordered a green one a few months ago and it arrived as pictured. The second one I have just received was supposed to be the same green but is more of a yellow color, which is disappointing since it was purchased to match the first one. It’s still nice, just not what was expected. I also have two of the white ones and they are lovely, perfect to throw on the couch and easily wash when they become dirty from the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Fourteen88

customer_reviews.title: Coloring was off
customer_reviews.text: The color was definitely not the same, probably a misprint. The company was very helpful in offering to replace it, but I ended up tearing it during a hurricane shortly after getting it. (I needed something to keep debris out after my window exploded and it was perfect size and I was panicked, okay?) I ended up keeping it, and it has grown on me the color that it is. Overall, great quality (held up to a cat 5 hurricane outside the window with minimal tearing) and great customer service from the company!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Harper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 to cover a whole wall. Worked perfectly. They are heavily inked, so if you plan to wear these know the blue dye is coming out onto you or into that first wash immensely. I believe they have done this to ensure deep blue tones in the fabric as promised. So wash alone or with other blue items with white vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: t4k4n4m1

customer_reviews.title: It's very beautiful, but mine was shipped with rips and stains ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very beautiful, but mine was shipped with rips and stains all over it. Who wouldn't be able to spot all of these brown stains on a sky blue tapestry?! It looks like children used to eat and play on it. And it smells really bad when you first receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Pnut Budder

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous colors fabric quality not so great
customer_reviews.text: Love the print the colors on mine are gorgeous! There was a slight smell so I washed it on gentle and dried it on low. I had several areas where the fabric began to fray and one spot where the seam began to unravel there is now a small hole on two edges... so overall it gets an ok from me. I believe washing this was it's undoing maybe if there is odor hang it outside or fabreze it. Suitable for a wall hanging but for everyday use if you can't wash it I don't know what you could use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Bleu Moon

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and well made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely drop dead gorgeous colors and beautifully printed. I bought two and use them as curtains in my freshly painted office; just folded over the top to form a curtain rod pocket and glued with fabric glue (I flunked sewing in high school and see no need to relive that failure; besides, fabric glue is a perfectly acceptable alternative!). They hang beautifully and really add something unexpected and colorful to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Bold, bright colors!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hang in my wall above my bed and I love it! It's large enough to cover the space I needed and I'm very happy with it, but 1 star off because the color was a little off from the pictures. The colors are VERY BOLD. Not as bright as the pictures on the ad. The fabric is light weight and would let minimal light in, so it would also be good to hang over a window and not make the space dark. I posted I video of the colors with flash and also a picture with and with out flash so the colors can show.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Great color pop to neutral environment
customer_reviews.text: Added to our gazebo for a color pop. Looks great, adds a colorful and fun component to a neutral gazebo. Does not hold up well in bright sun, holds up well in partially shaded areas. Faded, thinned and disintegrated when hung facing westering sun, but held up nicely facing other directions with more filtered sunlight. Overall, pleased with purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Mudpuppy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for good vibes💓
customer_reviews.text: I like how colorful it is! It isn’t splotchy but there is some brown spots most likely due to the colors colliding but it isn’t a big deal overall it is beautiful and I can’t wait to put this in my new room. I wanted to do a review of the tie dye tapestry because there isn’t many reviews on it and I wanna share with people what its going to be like once they get it so they won’t blindly purchase it and not know what there getting. But I highly recommend this! Also it came early than it said it would so that’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Very low-quality. Discolored wood stains and overspray.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this item. Item not at all as described. Colors did not match item description or a picture. Camed as you can see in photo. Also came with tons of blue specks or mold. Unsure think that it's probably overspray from dying or something. Anyway immediate return.
customer_reviews.author: Faine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - different green
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tapestry. Especially for the price! It could have been my computer screen, but I was expecting more of a neutral green ... like a forest green almost. When it arrived, it looks more like a neon green. Still pretty! Just much brighter than expected. This will be great for circles that I host and will be great as a centerpiece. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsw06

customer_reviews.title: pretty but.....
customer_reviews.text: The wall hanging is pretty and of a nice fabric for hanging but the size in the ad and on the package are incorrect. The one I received was 54 inches wide but only 80 inches long....even though both the ad and the package said 90 inches. I am disappointed in the huge difference in size.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: First of all the tapestry looks nothing like the advertised one what so ever the colors are ...
customer_reviews.text: Come on now, this is complete false advertisement. First of all the tapestry looks nothing like the advertised one what so ever the colors are way darker, don't waste your money, please buy a real tapestry
customer_reviews.author: Ednell & Solumie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Run. If I could give this a negative score I would. Not anything like the picture. I gave this as a gift and when they returned bc it was so bad, the company wouldn't refund the full amount. Had to purchase a new gift for them and embarrassed about how it was handled by the company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s heavier than I thought, so the command strips need to be extra hold. The fabric isn’t as nice as I thought, it’s cheaply made. But, once hanging, it’s cute. My daughter used it and likes it. That’s what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Makes gorgeous curtains
customer_reviews.text: Ten minutes at the sewing machine and a pair of these became lovely curtains. They are somewhat sheer so if you need lots of privacy you could line them. I love how lightweight they are and how they billow with every breeze. They cast a cool blue light on the room. I love everything about these. Exercise caution when washing. They will shed some blue dye.
customer_reviews.author: Ember

customer_reviews.title: Very ugly
customer_reviews.text: The black lines and very dark blue-green ( a color I hate) dominate the pattern and clash with the orange. It is an eyesore. The weight is good for what I needed it for but it is so ugly I will probably return it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected but colors are really nice!
customer_reviews.text: The colors on this piece are really beautiful but it’s tiny! (I have an actual twin size that is a very similar pattern in the same vibrant colors.) But I thought I was ordering a twin - I use these as tablecloths - but this is a small wall hanging at best. The package says it’s a throw - not even. Fabric is very thin and one corner is not even square - it’s curved downward and looks like a mistake, although it is a seamed hem. I will keep this and find a use for it but buyer beware. Make sure you are getting the size you want.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jedlicka

customer_reviews.title: The coloring was somewhat different, but regardless it was ...
customer_reviews.text: The coloring was somewhat different, but regardless it was still similar. I gave it a five star rating because of the price. The quality is cheap. I did expect the tapestry to be longer and wider, but because I read the reviews after purchase I knew the size would be different. When I received the tapestry there was a strong ink odor but it is not repugnant.
customer_reviews.author: mitzian

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much satisfied
customer_reviews.text: These were nice but I ordered 8 and 3 of them didn’t quite match. Luckily I don’t care. They are of decent quality. Anyway one of the tapestries STANK like a barn. Seriously. Most of them smelled like vinegar a little but this one. WOOOOO. Barn. I aired it out for a few days and burned some incense under it and it mostly got rid of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: mary J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The price is right!
customer_reviews.text: This is bigger then I had imagined, it's a little darker then the picture but is still very pretty! Great for the price!!! It's sewn at the sides, but not at the top or bottom, I imagine I will add loops for hanging myself. It's on a cheaper thin material, but would make beautiful curtians!
customer_reviews.author: Rey1995

customer_reviews.title: The colors are NOT accurate
customer_reviews.text: I just received the green tapestry today. It is SUPER bright, almost neon green. Not the nice muted blue/grey green pictured here. I am trying to figure out if I can make it work, but I think people should know the colors in these photos are NOT accurate. I would have NEVER ordered the color I received.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color
customer_reviews.text: The product looks blue/turquoise in the picture. It is very green and dark blue and looks nothing like the picture. I would return it however they are charging me $5.99 for shipping it back so I might as well keep it as an ugly table cloth for $3.00. I do not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Works well but be careful
customer_reviews.text: I love the tapestry! I think that it's beautiful and it works incredibly well in my dorm. However, I would highly recommend washing or at least throwing it in the dryer before you hang it or handle it. When it is unpackaged it has a very strong odor ( something similar to chlorine). I ignored the odor and continued to hang up the tapestry, but later I began to break out in bumps all over my body. It turns out whatever was on the tapestry I was allergic to, so i had to wash it. Whatever that chemical is needs to be washed out before they send it out to customers!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Pickett

customer_reviews.title: We chose the blue one and it's great. It's also very big
customer_reviews.text: Color is as vivid as shown in the photo. We chose the blue one and it's great. It's also very big, we have our queen sized bed pushed against the wall sideways and it stretches past both ends.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Misaligned design
customer_reviews.text: Smells horrific like chemicals and design is misaligned in the middle. I’ve bought from this seller in the past and had a better outcome than this. Will not order again because I’m highly disappointed in the outcome of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty wonderful find
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this for the price. The cotton is stiff and not really comfortable, but that's great because its not a sheet! I use my outside to hang up for parties. It covers up my rough looking fence. Right now I only have one, but I plan to get a few more. I am putting grommets in the corners of mine so I can easily hang and remove them. It would be great if they came with some sort of hooks in the corners.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cribley

customer_reviews.title: Colors are very dilute
customer_reviews.text: Colors are not the same. The green background color is actually a very light yellowish green. It's not very good looking and definitely can't be used for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: True to color, but no hemming
customer_reviews.text: Basically a cut of fabric. No hems. Colors are vibrant and the pattern is great. Would score 5 stars if there was any kind of work put into them. You could get the same thing at your local fabric shop. Looks unfinished.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Wood

customer_reviews.title: SUPER PAISLEY TO THE RESCUE!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Boy ~ it's HUGE! Good buy and, I think, in a hard-to-find size! I haven't washed it yet but plan to cold wash it, hang dry to be safe, which I don't mind. Pretty paisley! Am using this first one for my round kitchen table. next one, for the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Chelseael

customer_reviews.title: Too small.. shabby.
customer_reviews.text: It was a quarter the size it was as supposed to be. And it wasn’t hemmed on any edges. I’m super disappointed. The last one I got was a different color and was beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Taylor

customer_reviews.title: pretty! used for temporary closet "doors"
customer_reviews.text: Bought to make temporary closet "doors" for two bedroom closets while custom doors are being built. I safety-pinned them over tension rods (instead of sewing pockets, so the tapestries can be used for something else later). Suited my needs perfectly. And, they look good!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Dunford

customer_reviews.title: beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I was going to use this for Kayaking. I have one in a similar print made out of a sheer fabric. How ever this one was a little heavier then I had planned so I gave it to my niece. It's about the thickness of a tea towel.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in NH

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The edge was completely unfinished and even cut REALLY crooked (not even a little which is forgivable). Not heavy which is good, but it feels very very cheap. Think the thin Walmart fabric that's mostly polyester and kinda see-through.
customer_reviews.author: Shannonkd97

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement, detest color-pattern, & design.
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is hideous in my opinion. Don't waste your money. This is false advertisement, detest color-pattern, & design I receive. Over 75% different from the beautiful blue tapestry in the photo. 25% similar because it is a shade of blue.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful Cascade of Blues.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tapestry, the colors are true to the picture. It came packaged neatly and nicely & shipping was really fast via Amazon Prime. The price was fantastic and I look forward to buying from this seller again for my home decor needs.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Eckols

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The item came VERY quickly. Told me it was going to take anywhere from 1- 1.5 months to receive, and it was on my doorstep in 4 days. Seller however did not provide tracking which would have been nice. The product itself it nice for the price. I wasn’t expecting anything elaborate for $8. Color was slightly misrepresented in the picture. I was expecting more turquoise and lighter shades of blue. What I received what a royal blue, navy, green, and black. There is also a few spots where it didn’t take the print well.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla P.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The colors were vibrant and the size was as stated however, there were blotches and smudges in black on it. Several areas where the dye ran beyond where it should. I returned it, but if you don't mind some flaws it is quite pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Sparklers

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, ink runs, really rough
customer_reviews.text: These are rough, small, and the colors bleed so that the White is no longer white. You’ll be left with dingy grey/blue, full of pilling and rough edges.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Stone

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It took over a month for me to get the item. When I asked for tracking info the seller said they were “on leave” and to contact them afterward a certain date. When I did tracking info still was not provided. Anyway the item is big and of decent quality, definitely not as bright and radiant as the picture. But it was $7 so I’m keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: KG006

customer_reviews.title: I married The Grinch, True Story.
customer_reviews.text: These are Lovely...Adding these to the inner walls of the two big guest tents =) I just bought velcro dots to apply them <3 NICE <3
customer_reviews.author: The Grinch Family

customer_reviews.title: Good tapestry
customer_reviews.text: Bought This for my daughter for her bedroom. It’s not as big as I thought it would be so we decided to use it as a curtain instead of a wall hanging. It’s nice and bright and brings out the rest of the colors in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Cogswell

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Almost exactly as pictured. A few stray threads on hem that also was a little bunched in places but not noticeable for what I used it for. Bright green colors and nice weight of fabric. I recommend this throw.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Must have for hippie
customer_reviews.text: I love this tapestry! I ordered it for my backyard fence and it works perfectly there. Huge size with thick fabric and I didn't see any imperfections in the design like other reviewers had mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: So I was really hoping this would be a finished piece of fabric, but it is definitely just a chunk cut off of a spool, you will have to edge it yourself. It's good for how cheap it is, just intend to finish it. Also, it is a relatively thick material, close to a canvas material
customer_reviews.author: Amber Simons

customer_reviews.title: Not true to color. Blue Dyed over previous dye is all.
customer_reviews.text: Material is fine I just think the picture color and the color you receive are different. It’s exactly the same as the lighter colored one but it’s like they just soaked the whole thing in blue dye over it. It’s not a transition of colors and shading isn’t there it’s just a normal one that got soaked in dye. Not true to color at all. Much more turquoise than blue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty enough but varies greatly from the picture and the TWO edges that are hemmed look like it’s done on a cheap machine.. the other two edges aren’t finished. A person would be better off going to a craft store and buying a couple yards of material.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This looks so pretty on a wall or as a bed covering. The colors are bright and beautiful. It looks even better in person.. I bought it for my teen daughter's bedroom to hang on the wall adjacent to her white bedding. It makes the whole room. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: I was really surprised because I didn't expect it to look this good. I strongly recommend this to put in your ...
customer_reviews.text: READ THIS!!!!! I'm a 13 year old girl and I was looking for something to make my room pop more and this was exactly what I was looking for. I was really surprised because I didn't expect it to look this good. I strongly recommend this to put in your room. This is 5 stars for me. 💜💜💜💜💜
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant Colors
customer_reviews.text: What I ordered wasn't what I expected - it was the wrong size. The two that I ordered were much smaller than what I expected to get having bought several over the years. The colors were nice but more a twin size tapestry instead of a queen size.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This looked nothing like the photo.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. Fabric was different than photo. Not high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jo McCroskey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the brilliant eye popping colors. Couldn’t get over the price. It’s going to be used as a wall piece in our bohemian home.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: STAINED
customer_reviews.text: Love the tapestry, But theirs red stains all over it in several spots. Looks like someone wrote on it .VERY VERY unhappy I can't even use it now.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Edge

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, vibrant colors & good quality
customer_reviews.text: ❤️ exactly what I was looking for. Material is soft, lightweight & made well. It does shrink a tad, as expected, so it’s slightly short on the ends for my table, but looks beautiful & I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi P.

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice, cheap-ish tapestry
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice, cheap-ish tapestry. The color isn't as bright as shown in the picture, but if you hang it up near the sunlight, the color really lights up the room. When you look at it up close, though, you can tell the print isn't aligned perfectly, but that's just a minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Slyer

customer_reviews.text: The estimated arrival time was 1-2 weeks but it arrives in just a few days! It's exactly like the picture and about the size of a queen bed sheet which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Item not as described
customer_reviews.text: Just a cut sheet of fabric. Edges not sewn at all. Unraveled easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M.

customer_reviews.title: Some brown stains
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is beautiful. My daughter loves it. I really wanted to give 5Stars but...... Once I got it out and went to hang it up, I noticed some brown stains in some places. (these are not supposed to be there) Since it’s hanging up high on the wall it’s not too noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Colours definitely not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: So I went ahead and bought this since it seemed legit. But the product I got was definitely not what was advertised. The colours are more green than they are blue and just look weird. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Areesha

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Too thin for my liking. Purchased for my teen, but she was not interested. Don’t shop for a teen without asking first if she likes :(
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: They are very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty but very cheaply made & only held up one day on our sofa. We have 2 mini schnauzers & within literally one day after being on the sofa, there were holes on all of them. VERY disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cute product
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. When I first received it I was so excited and was not sure what to do with it, however it is now hanging up on my wall. Very vibrant and accurate dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Tdonelow

customer_reviews.title: Colors not vivid like picture. Faded considerably with the first wash
customer_reviews.text: Just MEH. Colors not vivid like picture. Faded considerably with the first wash. Printing is far off, leaving obvious gaps between colors. Don't waste your cash.
customer_reviews.author: Becky T.

customer_reviews.title: True to color, color bleeds so wash a few times!
customer_reviews.text: The blue was very vibrant and true to color. Definitely wash this a few times! The color will bleed onto your fingers etc otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely brought back my "hippie" days. Daughter wanted Bohemian style bridal shower. Perfect for table clothes and draping around chairs & mimosa bar. Ordered many others in various colors. Washed up nicely without falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: DebsD

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love this product so much I bought five more and I am making curtains with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The product is beautiful. More green than I thought it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t given a tracking number originally, the package was about a week later than promised, and the box had already been cut open when it arrived to my door step. Probably the most interesting Amazon delivery I’ve ever recieved. However! The product is beautiful. More green than I thought it would be but it is very pretty. I don’t expect to ever order another one but I’m happy the one I bought finally made its way to me.
customer_reviews.author: Spence Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Great tapestry. Smell takes a long time to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tapestry. Smell takes a long time to get out but I love the color and came in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Tapestry
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, however the pattern on the one we received is a little different from the one in the picture. There is more of the dark blue on ours. The colors are bright and clear though. The edge on one side was sewn a bit crooked, but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my room so full!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tapestry, it’s so cute in my dorm and they are sure to make my roommate jealous ! It really fills ups the blank space on my wall . I also got the lights from amazon as well! Great duo. It also came 4 weeks early!
customer_reviews.author: Zakaria Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Versatile little tapestry - very bright and cheery with that bohemian look.
customer_reviews.author: eleos & charis

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! Looks just like the picture, very vibrant. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Gray

customer_reviews.title: WOWZA
customer_reviews.text: Love this tapestry. It is beautiful and larger. The bright colors make the roomer feel lighter and larger. 10/10 would recommend. The pattern is eyecatching and never dull. Each time I walk into a room its like the first time I see it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this has it on wall since day she got it . Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Gino leccese

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Just absolutely worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than specified dimensions. Just a tad larger than a beach towel. It is in no way a tapestry. It's more like a cheap dollar store bed sheet or a left over piece of fabric. The colors are not nearly as vibrant as the picture. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ann

customer_reviews.title: ... a few months ago and I am still in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tapestry a few months ago and I am still in love with it. For the price it is very good. I got it to use as a kind of headboard for above the bed and to cover wall space. I love the colors and the design.
customer_reviews.author: Emmala

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color as ad picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift to match teal colors. I was expecting the Teal color Blue in picture that I ordered. I received a darker color than what was in the order picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Saves

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but not horrible, decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not perfect and up closes images is a bit blurry but when hung on the wall it looks nice. Did have very strong chemical like smell. Had to let it sit out outside for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I use this as a table cloth. The colors are really pretty and it looks as pictured. The colors have not bleed in the wash and the cotton is wearing well.
customer_reviews.author: Ra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple way to add shade to my porch. I bought two of these and hung them like curtains. They look fabulous and are holding up very well to the weather. These are only one sided prints but still look fantastic. They are made of a lightweight material but still durable. I have had no issues thus far. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jessica newman

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color
customer_reviews.text: Took over a month to ship even though it said it was in stock and when I get it it’s not even the same as the pic. It’s an ugly green color. Debating if I can still use this or if I’m just going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the picture, it's super cheap looking. The colors aren't even close. So thin, I am not happy with the product received.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh....
customer_reviews.text: The colors were not as bright as in the picture. Looks cheaply made and texture is rough. It’s pretty big though which is nice. It’s a very cheap tapestry though so I wasn’t expecting it to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Rice

customer_reviews.title: Affordable glam :)
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful. Excellent gift for sure. An affordable way to jazz up a room
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.

customer_reviews.title: from 3 different Amazon sellers and this one was my least favorite as it is cheaply made and just looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: i ordered 3 different but similar wall tapestries, from 3 different Amazon sellers and this one was my least favorite as it is cheaply made and just looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color in this tapestry
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color in this tapestry!! Not cheaply made either considering the low price. Would definitely like to purchase another one in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Not As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: The colors are SO much darker than what is pictured here. I should have paid more attention to the reviews. It’s all dark green and dark blue. No light blue or turquoise. Pretty disappointed, but for $10 I can’t be too upset. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Daughter wanted for her room and it is a good size to cover a room wall and add a ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter wanted for her room and it is a good size to cover a room wall and add a little decor and color to a wall. It was exactly what she was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Earthroma Llc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Super price and wall hanging... Vibrant and full of light !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very thin material
customer_reviews.text: It is very very very thin material and the edges are frayed like a ripped sheet.. but it is cute and good size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Strong, vibrant colors! Very big! It came with a few loose strings that needed to be trimmed before I felt good about gifting it. Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, washed well
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality, washed well, faded a slight bit even with sensitive detergent & line dry but not a lot. Great quality for price and huge tapestry. Highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful and large use this as a wall hanging in my daughters room she loves it and the colors are gorgeous. Nothing was running or bleeding in the colors happy with the quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Use your imagination.  There are many projects possible.
customer_reviews.text: I love these tapestries. I use them for many projects. Made a chair cover from one and ordered two more to make a valance and dresser scarf for my bedroom. I also got one to hang behind a wooden screen to use as my headboard. Can't wait to get the project going!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Downing

product_meta.title: Craftozone 90 x 54 inch Cotton Indian Wall Decor Hippie Tapestries Bohemian Mandala Tapestry Wall Hanging Throw
product_meta.description: Size:90" x54"| Color:White BlueBeautiful Indian screen printed cotton mandala printed tapestry or bed cover in twin size. The fabric has been stone washed and on top of the mandala design was screen printed in sharp blue and shades of green color. Front side has white base on mandala print have been crafted. This gorgeous piece of art can be used as bedspread, bed cover, table cloth, curtain and of course as a tapestry or a wall hanging. Add an ethnic feel to your room with this cotton handmade wall hanging. Go for a dramatic makeover of your wall and this tapestry would become a conversational piece of art. A must have in any season for all ethnic savvy ones. This is a rare beauty not to be missed, a genuine collector's item & the result of masterly workmanship. This tapestries are completely screen printed in traditional Indian method and takes around a week to complete. 100% cotton - this tapestries are printed, not quilted or woven. They are hippie Indian tapestries. Thin as sheet. Good, tight power loom construction. Hemmed edges. Each tapestry has its unique imperfections. In some cases what printers would call registration errors are intentionally included on the screen print to simulate hand woodblock prints. Note: Actual images of items in indirect sunlight are shown above. We follow WYSIWYG "what you see is what you get". The original color of items which you buy may differ minutely from the images due to camera capture sensitivity, lighting & even your system screens, so there may be a minor possibility in change of brightness & contrast. Depending on the size of products there may be dimension variation because products are made by hand and also variation in weight due to moisture, dryness, gravity and different measuring machines. This beautiful home decor piece can be used as tapestry, wall hanging, bedspread, wall decor, wall art, bed cover, room divider, curtain, table cloth, college dorm, picnic blanket and beach throw.
feature_bullets: This beautiful Home Decor Piece can be used as Tapestry, Wall Hanging, Bedspread, Wall Decor, Wall Art, Bed Cover, Room Divider, Curtain, Table Cloth, College Dorm, Picnic blanket and Beach throw
Tapestry Size - : 90 x54 Inches Made of 100% Cotton Fabric With Screen Printed Design on it
Care : Dry Clean or Gentle Hand Wash Separately In Cold Water
This lightweight mandala tapestry has a beautiful ethnic intricate Indian manually printed design to it
